description: This file is a C++ header file defining the interface class 'IFactories' in the namespace 'WPEFramework::PluginHost', which provides access to various web-related proxy objects and manages factory instances.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An interface class providing virtual methods to obtain proxies for Web requests, responses, file bodies, and JSON-RPC messages. Also manages singleton-like access and allocation of factory instances.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::Request object.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::Response object.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::FileBody object.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Returns a proxy to a Web::JSONBodyType containing a Core::JSONRPC::Message.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Static method to assign an instance of IFactories.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Static method returning a reference to the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks whether the IFactories instance is available.
